course.title: JavaScript Mastery Course
course.description: A comprehensive course to master JavaScript programming.

lessons.title: Getting Started with JavaScript
lessons.content: Introduction to the basics of JavaScript programming.

lessons.title: Variables and Data Types
lessons.content: Learn about variables, data types, and basic operations in JavaScript.

lessons.title: Conditional Statements
lessons.content: Explore if statements, switch statements, and other conditional constructs.

lessons.title: Functions and Scope
lessons.content: Understand functions, function expressions, and variable scope in JavaScript.

lessons.title: Introduction to Objects
lessons.content: Learn about objects, properties, and methods in JavaScript.

lessons.title: Constructor Functions and Prototypes
lessons.content: Explore constructor functions, prototypes, and inheritance.

lessons.title: Callbacks and Promises
lessons.content: Understand asynchronous programming with callbacks and promises.

lessons.title: Async/Await and Fetch API
lessons.content: Explore modern asynchronous JavaScript with async/await and Fetch API.
